verbs.description: [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [V: took] [ARG2: to Twitter] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARGM-PRP: to wade into a feud with the actor Robert De Niro . An outspoken critic of Trump since the 2016 presidential election] , De Niro has chastised Trump in multiple public appearances in the past few days .
